title: From GEO to LEO to Hybrid: Why the Future of SatCom Is Multi-Orbit and Multi-Provider
subtitle: How the satellite industry is evolving from single-orbit dominance to integrated, application-aware networks
excerpt: The future isn't GEO-only or LEO-only. It's hybrid, multi-orbit, multi-provider, and cloud-integrated. This business model transformation will define the next decade of satellite connectivity.
author: Davis Mathew Kuriakose
